subject: Welcome to the team
body: Hey! Welcome aboard. Here's some onboarding info...

subject: Big sale this week
body: Check our sale on electronics — up to 50%!

subject: Upcoming Performance Review
body: Your annual performance review is scheduled for next Monday at 2 PM. Please prepare your self-assessment.

subject: Weekend Plan?
body: Hey, are we still on for the hiking trip this Saturday? Let me know what time works.

subject: Unusual login attempt
body: We noticed a login attempt from a new device. If this wasn't you, please secure your account immediately.

subject: Certificate of Completion
body: Congratulations! You've successfully completed the Python Advanced Course. Your certificate is attached.

subject: Your order has been shipped
body: Your package is on the way! Estimated delivery: September 23.

subject: Reminder: AI Conference 2025
body: Don’t forget: Your registration for AI Conference 2025 is confirmed. Event starts on October 3rd.
